welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sassenberg, a charming city famous for its idyllic lakes and rich history. We hope you have a wonderful stay and take the time to discover all the hidden gems this city has to offer. Enjoy your time here!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Guetersloh Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
